_comment_secret: Set SESSION_SECRET environment variable - do not store secrets in this file!
_comment_blocked_types: Blocked MIME types based on magic numbers. Default blocks executables and scripts.
_comment_quotas: Quotas: max_storage_bytes=100GB global, per_ip_daily_bytes=1GB/day, per_ip_daily_files=100/day, max_file_size_bytes=10GB/file. Set to 0 to disable.
_comment_retention: file_retention_days: Automatically delete files older than N days. Set to 0 to keep files forever (default: 30 days).
_comment_audit: audit_log_retention_days: Automatically delete audit logs older than N days. Set to 0 to keep logs forever (default: 90 days).
_comment_collection: collection_expiration_days: Collections expire after N days from oldest file. Set to 0 to disable expiration (default: 7 days).
_comment_session: session_timeout_hours: How long sessions remain valid. Default: 24 hours.
